newsitem.title: USA: FSA says hires Finn for municipals.
newsitem.headline: FSA says hires Finn for municipals.

text.p: Paul Finn, formerly a senior vice president of AMBAC Inc's AMBAC Indemnity Corp, has joined Financial Security Assurance as a director in the municipal finance group, FSA said Monday.

FSA, a unit of Financial Security Assurance Holdings Ltd, said Finn will work with James Scanlon, managing director of municipal dealer relationships, to maintain and expand FSA's relationships in public finance, syndication and portfolio management.

"FSA's municipal group now numbers 50 professionals, many of whom held senior positions at investment banks, rating agencies and other bond insurers before joining FSA," Robert Cochran, FSA's president and chief executive officer, said in a statement.
Finn had been in regional sales at AMBAC since 1985. The firm recently reorganized its municipal operations, eliminating that job category.
